\newline

","Steps":[{"id":"s1","n_params":2,"step_txt":" 
 It is given that

 8 : j = 7 : 4

 \frac{\input[s1v1]{} i + j 7 }{i 5 + \input[s1v2]{} j }

 "},{"id":"s2","n_params":2,"step_txt":"

 = \frac{ \frac{4 i }{j } + \input[s2v1]{} }{\frac{\input[s2v2]{} i }{j } + 5 }
\]
 "},{"id":"s3","n_params":2,"step_txt":"
 \[
 = \frac{ 4 \left (\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{7 } \right ) + 2 }{\input[s3v2]{} \left(\frac{8 }{7 } \right) + 5 }
\]
 "},{"id":"s4","n_params":2,"step_txt":"
 \[
 = \frac{\frac{\input[s4v1]{} + 14 }{7 }}{\frac{\input[s4v2]{} + 35 }{7 }}
\]

\]
 "},{"id":"s5","n_params":1,"step_txt":"

 = \frac{\input[s5v1]{} }{91 }
\]

 "},{"id":"s6","n_params":0,"step_txt":"

"}]};export var resp=[{"data":["i",2],"text":" $$ \text{Please refer back to the question.} $$

 "},{"data":[32,56],"text":"

 "},{"data":[46],"text":"

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If \(i : j = 8 : 7 \), then find \((4 i + 2 j ):(7 i + 5 j )\)
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " 
 It is given that 
\[
 8 : j = 7 : 4 
\]
We need to find the value of 
\[
 \frac{\input[s1v1]{} i + j 7 }{i 5 + \input[s1v2]{} j }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ \frac{4 i }{j } + \input[s2v1]{} }{\frac{\input[s2v2]{} i }{j } + 5 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ 4 \left (\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{7 } \right ) + 2 }{\input[s3v2]{} \left(\frac{8 }{7 } \right) + 5 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\frac{\input[s4v1]{} + 14 }{7 }}{\frac{\input[s4v2]{} + 35 }{7 }}
\]
\[
 = \frac{32 + 14 }{56 + 35 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\input[s5v1]{} }{91 }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
 So, the answer is $46 : 91 $
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["i", 2], "text": " $$ \text{Please refer back to the question.} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [2, 7], "text": " $$ \text{Dividing numerator and denominator by j, we get the expression} \frac{ \frac{4 i }{j } + 2 }{\frac{7 i }{j } + 5 }
\] $$ 
 "}, {"data": [8, 7], "text": " $$ \text{Substitute the given ratio of } i:j = 8:7 {, to get the expression}\frac{ 4 \left (\frac{8 }{7 } \right ) + 2 }{7 \left(\frac{8 }{7 } \right) + 5 } $$ 
 "}, {"data": [32, 56], "text": " 
 $$ \text{We take LCM's to get the expression} \frac{\frac{32 + 14 }{7 }}{\frac{56 + 35 }{7 }}
, \text{after which multiplying both numerator and denomiator by} 8 \text{, we get} \frac{32 + 14 }{56 + 35 } $$ 
 "}, {"data": [46], "text": " 
 $$ \text{ Upon further simplification we get the following answer} \frac{46 }{91 }."}, {"data": [], "text": "
 "}]
